name: Amazed (Maxine Red)
description:
Amazed is a simple maze puzzler.

It's my first game, written in C++ and using SDL2.

I made it quite simple, as you only have to start it up, pick "New Game" and chase the gems!

I hope you enjoy this fun little game as much as I had fun making it!

If you want to support me, please do so on my Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/maxine_red

Source code can be found here: https://github.com/maxine-red/amazed (fair warning: the code is less documented than it should be and might be messy. I wanted to finish this project and start on another.)

Minimum required Windows Version: WinXP

How to play:

Just download, unpack and double click on amazed.exe (Windows)

Unpack and start amazed, under the bin folder (Linux) and make sure that SDL2 and SDL2 image/mixer libraries are installed.

You can move around with arrow keys or WASD and ESC makes you go back to the main menu/quit the game.

There are two different themes available right now, so pick either gem or desert. It's the same game, with different looks.
